Your massage with Mike is confirmed for Thu 2/20 at 3pm. Reply CANCEL to cancel or RESCHEDULE to change.\"; **24h Reminder:** \"Reminder: You have a dental cleaning tomorrow at 10am with Dr. Lee. Reply CONFIRM or call 555-0123.\"; **2h Reminder:** \"Your appointment is in 2 hours! See you at 123 Main St. Parking in back.\"; **Payment Due:** \"Hi John, your invoice of $85 is due tomorrow. Pay here: bz.ng/pay/abc123\"; **Package Low:** \"You have 1 massage remaining in your package. Book your next session: bz.ng/book\"; **Re-engagement:** \"We miss you! It's been 60 days since your last visit. Book now with code COMEBACK for 15% off.\"; **Weather Alert:** \"Due to snow, we're offering free rescheduling.
